ygData.subject: Re: Neato Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t think it s a bug, but it does make it DAMN hard to get to the UK and have a decent conversation with him. The way Beld did it was he met up with
ygData.messageBody:
> My question to you all, is this:
> Does this sound like a bug? The part of him going
> Aggro on anyone instead of just the one who was
> fighting a Najena Inhabitant?

I don't think it's a bug, but it does make it DAMN hard to get to the UK and
have a decent conversation with him. The way Beld did it was he met up with
one of my guild's clerics (Ternada) and after they cleared the necros, the
cleric put a soothe-type spell (don't remember the cleric version's name) on
the UK and then Beld talked to him. Also, consider bringing along an
enchanter to mes the necros and/or mindwipe the UK after you kill the
necros.

I don't feel it should be this hard to get to our quest giver, let alone
have him attack US. Anyway, /feedback or /petition it, I dunno. You CAN talk
to the UK, but you definitely need some help.

Dravith Vandre'i
45 Dark Elven SK
Fennin Ro
